template/instructions for each run.images: Specify the location of the main folder containing the subfolders for all 5 runs.
template/instructions for each run.file ending: Specify the file type of the images '*.TIF'
template/instructions for each run.number baseline images: Specify the number of baseline images provided
template/instructions for each run.config: Specify the path to the config file to be used for the segmentation
template/instructions for each run.results: Specify the location where the results shall be stored

NOTE: Each run is analysed sperately, but the config file is the same for all

main.instruction: specify a folder for collecting general results
